actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to perform a study of the structures, operations, practices and regulation of Japan's capital and securities markets, and their implications for the United States.
short_title: Foreign Capital and Securities Markets Study Act of 1991

summary.text: Foreign Capital and Securities Markets Study Act of 1991 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to report to the Congress the results of a study conducted in consultation with the Securities and Exchange Commission and the U.S. Trade Representative regarding the capital and securities markets of Japan and their implications for the United States.

titles.title: Foreign Capital and Securities Markets Study Act of 1991

A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to perform a study of the structures, operations, practices and regulation of Japan's capital and securities markets, and their implications for the United States.
